rows.label: qst101105_msg0002
rows.name:
He was being attacked by
monsters when you saved him...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0003
rows.name:
And you even collected the
Confusion Ivy for him! Thank you.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0005
rows.name:
To finish the furniture, I need a
type of wood called Gulan Walnut.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0006
rows.name:
I was going to have Hol get some
at the Uneri Root Camp, but...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0007
rows.name:
Hol's ankle is severely
swollen, and the doctor told
him not to move for a while.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0008
rows.name:
I asked some of the townspeople, but
they refused, saying they didn't want
to negotiate with the Nopon there.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0009
rows.name:
I'll have to go myself, even if
it means closing the shop...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0010
rows.name:
I already feel bad enough
that you found Hol for me...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I'll take
you up on your offer.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0012
rows.name:
The Uneri Root Camp is at Zain's
Waytree on the Goldoa Plain.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0013
rows.name:
I've arranged to receive three
pieces of Gulan Walnut from
a Nopon named Mokumoku.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0014
rows.name:
Mokumoku gets good wood for
me, but he's greedy...

rows.label: qst101105_msg0015
rows.name:
I hope you can get it
without any trouble.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0101
rows.name:
Please take care of picking
up the Gulan Walnut.

rows.label: qst101105_msg0102
rows.name:
Mokumoku is waiting at the
Uneri Root Camp at Zain's
Waytree on the Goldoa Plain.
